00083   // Modifiers: 
00084 
00085   // decide which variables are to be included in the product PDF.
00086   // The default is to include everything, except if the tedious pointer is 0.
00087   // these functions can override it:
00088   void includeDeltaE(Bool_t include = kTRUE);
00089   void includeMD(Bool_t include = kTRUE);
00090   void includeMes(Bool_t include = kTRUE);
00091   void includeDalitz(Bool_t include = kTRUE);
00092   void includeNnCont(Bool_t include = kTRUE);
00093   void includeNnComb(Bool_t include = kTRUE);
00094 
00095   // Set the PDFs. See also useOwned***Pdf().
00096   void setDeltaEPdf(BdkPdfAbsBase& theDeltaEPdf);
00097   void setMDPdf(BdkPdfAbsBase& theMDPdf);
00098   void setMesPdf(BdkPdfAbsBase& theMesPdf);
00099   void setDalitzPdf(BdkPdfAbsBase& theDalitzPdf);
00100   void setNnContPdf(BdkPdfAbsBase& theNnContPdf);
00101   void setNnCombPdf(BdkPdfAbsBase& theNnCombPdf);
00102 
00103   // call set***Pdf(owned***Pdf) to use the owned PDFs. see also set***Pdf(...)
00104   void useOwnedDeltaEPdf() {setDeltaEPdf(_ownedDeltaEPdf);}
00105   void useOwnedMDPdf()     {setMDPdf(_ownedMDPdf);}
00106   void useOwnedMesPdf()     {setMesPdf(_ownedMesPdf);}
00107   void useOwnedNnContPdf() {setNnContPdf(_ownedNnContPdf);}
00108   void useOwnedNnCombPdf() {setNnCombPdf(_ownedNnCombPdf);}
